name: Medications App
about: Full-Stack app where users can perform full CRUD on their medications and user account. Deployed on AWS.

name: Musician Portfolio
about: A visually appealing portfolio website developed using HTML5 and CSS3 to leave a lasting impression on visitors.

name: Quiz App
about: App that simulates a quiz and gives a result to the user. Built using hooks in React. Gets the information from a JSON file.

name: AI Therapy
website: Full Stack App conected to ChatGPT API
